synopsis.text: Three courageous robots, Fuji, Kat≈ç, and Mori, embark on a mission to end a futile war that has ravaged Earth for over seven millennia in the year Mobile Century 8013. In the absence of humanity, military robots continue to fight for dominance, with the Rebellion Federation controlling Europe and the Principality of Shin centered in Asia. These young robots take a stand to put an end to this endless conflict and restore peace to the war-torn planet.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
